name: The fight nil
description:
Nilman edson un chavo con un proposito salvar la tierra de una invacion inesperada, con la ayuda de un cientifico que revelo el ataque de estos humanoides y su mision es protejerla a toda costa.

Nilman edson a guy with a purpose to save the land from an unexpected invasion, with the help of a scientist who revealed the attack of these humanoids and his mission is to protect it at all costs.
